moves.name: Wonder Room
moves.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

moves.name: Rock Throw
moves.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Rock Throw
moves.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: Rock Polish
moves.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

moves.name: Psywave
moves.description: The target is attacked with an odd  psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

moves.name: Embargo
moves.description: It prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.

moves.name: Cosmic Power
moves.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Heal Block
moves.description: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

moves.name: Stone Edge
moves.description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

moves.name: Explosion
moves.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Wonder Room
moves.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.
